name: Time Lines
description:
WELCOME TO TIMELINES Instructions
  • Use space bar to reset at any moment
  • it will give you 2 seconds to look at where the door and key is and then thay will diseapear
  • then it will give you 3 seconds to draw the platform then it will enable gravity and you will see if you succeed
Other Info
  • This is my first game jam so please be respectfull
Have FUN!!!
